name: FNF whitty Ballistic [ Crazy ] - Test
description:
V1.0.1 is here!

New stuff:

  • Added Menu tab with Controls and Links.
  • Removed animation bug when a lot of keys are clicked.
  • Added an Instrumental AudioPlayer so you can sing along!
  • Removed the H button easter egg.

A FNF [Friday Night Funkin'] fan-game test. (Whitty Ballistic)

Warning: I DO NOT OWN ANY OF THE SPRITES REPRESENTED IN THE GAME OR VIDEO, THOSE ARE PROPRETIES OF: Sock.clip and Nate Anim8

[Permission granted to use them].

Topic: Whitty [original mod: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/14457]

(Note: i'am not profiting off of this in any way shape or form, it's just for fun.)

Controls:

W - angy electric guitar noises

A - angy electric guitar noises...

S - angy electric guitar noises too

D - angy electric guitar noises again...

Q - Switch to 2nd rythm

F - Switch to 1st rythm

K - Play Instrumental

L - Stop Instrumental

Credits:

Sock.clip - Artist and song composer

Nate Anim8 - 2nd Animator

SaneBear - programming

Extra:

Subscribe to my yt to get notified for updates: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaZ3fGBmSgxZsz8VZd9DSug/featured
